actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Armed Services.

actions.subcommittee: Seapower and Strategic and Critical Materials
actions.text: Referred to Subcommittee on Seapower and Strategic and Critical Materials.

committees.subcommittee: Subcommittee on Seapower and Strategic and Critical Materials

official_title: A bill to require that a three-year supply of anthracite coal be acquired for the National Defense Stockpile.

summary.text: Directs the President to include anthracite coal as a strategic and critical material under the Strategic and Critical Materials Stock Piling Act and to acquire a three-year supply of U.S. produced anthracite coal for the National Defense Stockpile. Authorizes appropriations.

titles.title: A bill to require that a three-year supply of anthracite coal be acquired for the National Defense Stockpile.
